description:
CCleaner for PC helps you clean up your Windows computer, optimize performance, and maintain your online privacy.

Inject instant speed into your machine by freezing resource-hogging apps and programs and by removing the unnecessary files taking up room on your hard drive. Clear out errors, broken settings, and update drivers to improve stability. Protect your privacy by securely erasing tracking cookies and history.
New
- Expanded browser cleaning support
  - CCleaner now includes cleaning for the Neo Browser.
- Clearer scheduling setup
  - We’ve added an information screen to help you better understand how to use the scheduled cleaning feature.
Improved
- Better recovery when the app disconnects
  - If CCleaner loses connection to its background service, you’ll now be prompted to restart it quickly and easily.
Bug Fixes
- Duplicate Finder accuracy improved
  - Improved filters for Duplicate Finder so items are not found in multiple categories.
- Scheduling language issue resolved
  - Non-English users will no longer see English text appearing in Scheduling settings.
- Startup Manager interaction fixed
  - Resolved an issue that prevented some users from interacting with Startup Manager.
